sentences.en: A group of riders came into view on the dirt road.
sentences.cn: 一群骑车的人出现在那条土路上。

sentences.en: a patch of grass, covered in dog dirt
sentences.cn: 满是狗屎的一小片草地

sentences.en: Both parties use computers to dig up dirt on their opponents.
sentences.cn: 双方都用电脑搜集对手的丑事。

sentences.en: Dirt clogs the pores, causing spots.
sentences.cn: 灰尘堵塞毛孔，从而生出粉刺。

sentences.en: He claims Pasolini overtook and tackled him, pushing him into the dirt.
sentences.cn: 他声称帕索利尼追上去打他，把他推倒在烂泥里。

sentences.en: he condemned players for dragging the name of football through the dirt.
sentences.cn: 他谴责这些球员玷污了足球运动。

sentences.en: He dishes the dirt on his buddies.
sentences.cn: 他说自己伙伴的闲话。

sentences.en: He got me a bass dirt cheap.
sentences.cn: 他给我买了一把低音提琴，非常便宜。

sentences.en: Her bare feet were dirt-streaked and cracked with cold.
sentences.cn: 她赤裸的双脚上满是一道道的泥污，都冻得开裂了。

sentences.en: His clothes were covered in dirt.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服沾满了污垢。

sentences.en: His face and hands were black with dirt.
sentences.cn: 他的脸和手黑乎乎的，全是泥。

sentences.en: I drove along the dirt road.
sentences.cn: 我驱车沿那条土路行进。

sentences.en: Michael threw his handful of dirt onto the coffin.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔往棺材上撒了一把土。

sentences.en: Most of the dirt was on the outside of the tinted glass.
sentences.cn: 大部分灰尘在有色玻璃的外部。

sentences.en: People think they can treat me like dirt!
sentences.cn: 人们以为可以视我为草芥！

sentences.en: Steve was keen to get all the dirt he could on her.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫一心想要搜罗关于她的一切丑闻。

sentences.en: The dirt from the fields drifted like snow.
sentences.cn: 地里扬起的尘土像雪花一样被吹积成堆。

sentences.en: the film bombed at the box office and the critics made it eat dirt.
sentences.cn: 这部电影票房惨败，批评家们对它极尽羞辱之能事。

sentences.en: The rooster chased me across the dirt floor of the barn.
sentences.cn: 公鸡追着我跑过谷仓的泥土地面。

sentences.en: You should have seen the dirt on that car!
sentences.cn: 你没看见那车上沾了多少泥！

sentences.en: Your open pores excrete sweat and dirt.
sentences.cn: 通过张开的毛孔排出汗液和污垢。

words.tran_cn: 下流的，卑鄙的；污秽的；恶劣的；暗淡的

phrases.phrase: drag the name of someone (或 something) through the
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（通过不好的行为或诽谤）玷污（某人或某物的名誉）

trans.tran_cn: 污物，灰尘，泥土，松土，丑闻，狗屎
trans.tran_en: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust
